description: Try our easy to follow Spaghetti Puttanesca recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Spaghetti Puttanesca Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a large saucepan of water to the boil over high heat. Reduce heat to medium and add spaghetti, cook for 11 minutes. Drain and reserve 1/4 cup of pasta water.
Meanwhile heat oil a large frypan over medium high heat, add onions and cook for 2 minutes till softened. Add garlic and anchovies and cook for 1 minute.

Add tomatoes, olives, capers. Reduce heat to medium and cook for 10-12 minutes till thickened. Add drained cooked spaghetti and reserve pasta water to the pan, toss to coat. Stir in juice, parsley and season with a little salt and cracked pepper.
